title: MAP SHOWING MINERAL RESOURCE POTENTIAL, BEDROCK GEOLOGY, AND SAMPLE LOCALITIES OF THE SCORPION WILDERNESS STUDY AREA, GARFIELD AND KANE COUNTIES, UTAH
base_map: U.S. Geological Survey 1:24,000 Big Hollow Wash, 1968; Circle Cliffs 4SW unedited advance print, 1953; and Sunset Flat, 1964; and Moody Creek, 1:62,500, 1953
